title: Episode 27 - Kashmir - The first Indo - Pakistani War
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary: In this episode we explore the first clash between India and Pakistan in the mountains of Kashmir. What was so important about this region and why did India and Pakistan fight a war over it ?  How did the Kashmir conflict become involved in the wider Cold War and how did the conflict shape the future of both nations and the wider region? Learn all this and more !
